name: Tower of Oblivion
description:
Description

The world has been plunged into an age of darkness, full of demonic and malicious beings. The only salvation left for humanity lies in the mysterious Tower of Oblivion. Discover the secrets stored within, and restore peace to the world. 

Developer's Notes

This is an rpg maker game I made 5 years ago with the rpg maker vx ace engine. I never got to upload it because there was a pretty nasty bug that happens early on that I couldn't fix. It happens at the start, so an easy workaround is to simply restart the game. Please take note of this bug before you download and donate! Below is the link to my old Steam Workshop.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=702180600&tscn=1466572848
